solution_line_template: The number of bicycle wheels is {bicycle_wheels_per_bicycle} * {num_bicycles} = <<{bicycle_wheels_per_bicycle}*{num_bicycles}={total_bicycle_wheels}>>{total_bicycle_wheels}.
The number of tricycle wheels is {tricycle_wheels_per_tricycle} * {num_tricycles} = <<{tricycle_wheels_per_tricycle}*{num_tricycles}={total_tricycle_wheels}>>{total_tricycle_wheels}.
The number of unicycle wheels is {unicycle_wheels_per_unicycle} * {num_unicycles} = <<{unicycle_wheels_per_unicycle}*{num_unicycles}={total_unicycle_wheels}>>{total_unicycle_wheels}.

The total number of wheels is {total_bicycle_wheels} + {total_tricycle_wheels} + {total_unicycle_wheels} = <<{total_bicycle_wheels}+{total_tricycle_wheels}+{total_unicycle_wheels}={total_wheels}>>{total_wheels}.
